request.query: query($a: Int!, $b: Department!, $c: ProductName!, $d: [ProductName!]!, $e: SearchInput, $f: SearchInput){employees {id notes details {forename surname location {key {name}} hasChildren maritalStatus nationality pets {class gender name ... on Cat {type} ... on Dog {breed} ... on Alligator {dangerous}}} role {departments title ... on Engineer {engineerType} ... on Operator {operatorType}} hobbies {... on Exercise {category} ... on Flying {planeModels yearsOfExperience} ... on Gaming {genres name yearsOfExperience} ... on Other {name} ... on Programming {languages} ... on Travelling {countriesLived {key {name}}}} products} employee(id: $a){id details {forename location {key {name}}}} teammates(team: $b){id details {forename} products} productTypes {... on Documentation {url(product: $c) urls(products: $d)} ... on Consultancy {lead {details {forename}} name}} a: findEmployees(criteria: $e){details {forename}} b: findEmployees(criteria: $f){details {forename}}}
